text_logic_form: The triangle $ABC$ is an isosceles triangle.
Find the length of the line $AC$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The triangle $ABC$ is an isosceles triangle.
Find the length of the line $AC$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BA$ is $9x - 1$.
The length of the line $CA$ is $4x + 1$.
The length of the line $CB$ is $5x - 0.5$.
The length of the line $CA$ is equal to the length of the line $BC$.
line_instances: There are lines $BA$, $CA$, and $CB$, forming the triangle $ABC$.
